data.name: JUMANJI: The Curse Returns - Winter Resort
data.detailed_description:
Once you’ve saved Brantford, take Jumanji to the Winter Resort and battle jungle creatures on the icy slopes!

The tropical plants aren’t put off by the cold weather, instead they’re ready to transform your snow-covered escape into a nightmare of creeping vines!

Play as any of the original characters, or AJ the snowboarder and novice skier Yuki Sato! Choose the Mountain Bear or Snow Leopard tokens, and face the brand new Bear danger from the mountains bordering the Jumanji jungle!

It’s a high altitude, casual, co-op adventure for 4 players. Be careful or the jungle drums could cause an avalanche!
data.about_the_game:
Once you’ve saved Brantford, take Jumanji to the Winter Resort and battle jungle creatures on the icy slopes!

The tropical plants aren’t put off by the cold weather, instead they’re ready to transform your snow-covered escape into a nightmare of creeping vines!

Play as any of the original characters, or AJ the snowboarder and novice skier Yuki Sato! Choose the Mountain Bear or Snow Leopard tokens, and face the brand new Bear danger from the mountains bordering the Jumanji jungle!

It’s a high altitude, casual, co-op adventure for 4 players. Be careful or the jungle drums could cause an avalanche!
data.short_description: Play Jumanji in the Winter Resort Map and banish jungle creatures in a snowy wonderland! Add two characters and tokens to your collection and face a whole new riddle!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core, 2 GHz single core processor
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 class GPU [1280 x 720]
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
